downloadTitle: Achieving governmental identity standards with the Microsoft Identity Platform
downloadDescription: Publications guiding architects and other decision makers on how to achieve NIST guidelines by using the Microsoft Identity Platform.

downloadFile.name: Achieving NIST Authentication Assurance Levels with the Microsoft Identity Platform.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/b/3/c/b3c71ea7-910a-46ba-b57f-62cf63514dd5/Achieving NIST Authentication Assurance Levels with the Microsoft Identity Platform.pdf

detailsSection:
The first document in this series, Achieving National Institute of Standards and Technology Authenticator Assurance Levels with the Microsoft Identity Platform guides architects in their planning and implementation of NIST AALs.
Future publications on additional NIST standards and other governmental standards are under consideration.
detailsSection_file_name: Achieving NIST Authentication Assurance Levels with the Microsoft Identity Platform.pdf
systemRequirementsSection: To implement the solutions in this white paper you must have an Azure subscription with Azure Active Directory
installInstructionSection: Implement the solutions that most align to your organiational needs.
